One of them goes to its roots - in a farm, and the other, discovers well-loved peranakan Okra dishes- in horror! Discover how the two master chefs draw inspiration - from Teochew and American cuisines- to create finger licking new dishes!

programme.title: The Second Husband - EP 4
programme.desc: (Dual language Mandarin and Korean) Feng Shanhua overcomes various hardships even after being wrongly accused. This is a story of fate, love, secrets and forgiveness that stem from her relationship with her two families, one of her birth mother and the other of the mother who raised her.

programme.title: Royal Doctor - EP 33
programme.desc: (Dual language Mandarin and Thai) Bua, a medical student from today's 5G era, is mysteriously swept back to King Rama III's reign - the golden era of Thai traditional medicine. Immediately thrown into an unknown world where she finds allies and rivals, her modern ways inevitably clash with old traditions.

programme.title: Meant To Be - EP 77
programme.desc: (Dual language Mandarin and Korean) New video evidence emerges connecting Daoxian to Shangzhe’s death, while Yin Song rushes to look for Zhihuan after getting a call from him.

programme.title: Meant To Be - EP 78
programme.desc: (Dual language Mandarin and Korean) As the incriminating evidence against him mounts, Daoxian chooses the extreme. _x000D_Yin Song is granted a retrial and is found not guilty, while Zhihuan is finally brought to justice with a life sentence._x000D_

programme.title: National Star Raiders - EP 7

programme.title: What’s Wrong with Secretary Kim - EP 3
programme.desc: (Dual language Mandarin and Korean) After receiving a mysterious call from President Piao, Weixiao rushes to an amusement park where fireworks bloom and Yingjun appears before her.

programme.title: Aku Butuh Ayang Walau Tuhan Maha Penyayang
programme.desc: Naya takes care of a man named Leo (Rizky Fachrel) who can't walk due to an accident during illegal motorcycle racing. Leo's mother said that Leo is an introverted child and has no friends. She asked Naya to be comfortable taking care of Leo. Naya told Leo's mother that she would take care of and help Leo until Leo could recover. Naya diligently takes care of Leo, helping him during physiotherapy. Unexpectedly, Leo likes Naya.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 40
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Senyum Neng Yang Bikin Gula Cepet Abis
programme.desc: It is said that Fahri (Erdin Werdrayana) has just returned from traveling to the city. He wants to meet his girlfriend Tiara in the village. However, it turns out that Tiara is engaged to a handsome, rich man, and the girl even said that her future husband will soon become the village head. Then from there, Fahri, who feels hurt and resentful because he has been betrayed, becomes obsessed with becoming the village head. Fahri asks for help from a beautiful girl who owns a grocery store.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 494
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. Long story short, Ferdi already had a girlfriend, but her girlfriend turned out to be fierce to Ferdi's son, Rafa, even to the point of slapping him. Finally, Mirna helped Rafa and was loved by him.

programme.desc: Galih (Cemal Faruk), a photographer, immediately falls in love with make-up artist Audi (Yiriska Patricia). Galih immediately sets out on a mission to win Audi's heart.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 495
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 21
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: Jadi Bos Jangan Galak Galak, Gak Bahaya Ta?
programme.desc: A police officer named Ferdi (Andrew Andika) who was driving his car, was suddenly almost hit by a motorbike driven by a reckless woman named Mirna (Anjani Dina). Finally the police officer reprimanded him, Mirna said that she was in a hurry. One day they met again at Ferdi's house. Long story short, Ferdi already had a girlfriend, but her girlfriend turned out to be fierce to Ferdi's son, Rafa, even to the point of slapping him. Finally, Mirna helped Rafa and was loved by him.

programme.title: Aku Butuh Ayang Walau Tuhan Maha Penyayang
programme.desc: Naya takes care of a man named Leo (Rizky Fachrel) who can't walk due to an accident during illegal motorcycle racing. Leo's mother said that Leo is an introverted child and has no friends. She asked Naya to be comfortable taking care of Leo. Naya told Leo's mother that she would take care of and help Leo until Leo could recover. Naya diligently takes care of Leo, helping him during physiotherapy. Unexpectedly, Leo likes Naya.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 41
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Senyum Neng Yang Bikin Gula Cepet Abis
programme.desc: It is said that Fahri (Erdin Werdrayana) has just returned from traveling to the city. He wants to meet his girlfriend Tiara in the village. However, it turns out that Tiara is engaged to a handsome, rich man, and the girl even said that her future husband will soon become the village head. Then from there, Fahri, who feels hurt and resentful because he has been betrayed, becomes obsessed with becoming the village head. Fahri asks for help from a beautiful girl who owns a grocery store.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 495
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: KAPAN NIKAH? VS DOAIN AJA
programme.desc: Jana (Glenca Chysara) and Jeni (Ina Marika) are two sisters with different personalities. Jana is a tomboy and works as a car mechanic. Meanwhile, Jeni is a girl who likes to dress up, hang out, and is feminine. The two swap bodies after being electrocuted. Meanwhile, Rafi (Fendy Chow) is Jeni's boyfriend. There is turmoil of love and feelings between the two sisters.

programme.desc: Nadin (Rachquel Nesia), who doesn't want her parents to arrange a marriage for her, is advised by her housekeeper to find a fake boyfriend. The man is Jaki (Ridho Ilahi), whom Nadin has met before. They are very surprised, but they must continue their mission.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 42

programme.title: Chapalrela - EP 1

programme.title: Seminggu Sekali - EP 11
programme.desc: Bersama Douglas Lim & Adibah Noor, saksikan mereka mengupas dan menyampaikan isu semasa kepada masyarakat secara santai dan lucu.

programme.title: Opah Popular - EP 11
programme.desc: Badrul dan Sofia bertugas di luar negara dan menghabiskan cuti dengan balik ke kampung. Anaknya mereka dipaksa untuk tinggal bersama opah.

programme.title: Tabung Lawak 2 - EP 21
programme.desc: Tabung Lawak ialah pelbagai klip video pendek untuk menekankan topik-topik hangat dalam cara yang lucu.

programme.desc: Bosan dengan desakan ibunya untuk berkahwin, Hairi akhirnya bersetuju dengan syarat dia boleh memilih jodohnya sendiri. Adakah calon pilihan Hairi menepati citarasa ibunya?

programme.title: Klik Riders - EP 21
programme.desc: Sebuah program untun tontonan semua.

programme.desc: Sebuah program menarik untuk tontonan semua.

programme.title: Makhluk Manis Dalam Bis - EP 6

programme.title: Maharaja Lawak Mega 2013 - EP 1

programme.title: Betul Ke Bohong ? - EP 1
programme.desc: Panel selebriti memilih jawapan berdasarkan kenyataan dan cerita yang mungkin benar atau tidak, 2 kumpulan berentap untuk perolehi markah tertinggi.

programme.title: Sepahtu Reunion Live 2024 - EP 1

programme.title: Perang Periuk - EP 9
programme.desc: Rancangan memasak yang unik di mana ibu mentua akan bertarung dengan menantu perempuan untuk memenangi hati juri-juri dan orang yang tersayang dengan masakan mereka.

programme.title: Fam ILY - EP 3
programme.desc: Ini kisah keluarga Shahir yang merupakan seorang kontraktor kelas F bersama isterinya Marissa (suri rumah sepenuh masa), anak remajanya Qalisha dan anak kecilnya Iman.

programme.title: Malaysian Ghost Stories - EP 3
programme.desc: Nusantara merupakan satu daerah yang tebal dengan semangat mistik dan alam ghaib. Setiap episod mempunyai penyelesaian yang unik bergantung kepada jenis gangguan, jenis jin dan kesan ke atas watak utama.

programme.title: Geng Mak-Mak - EP 3
programme.desc: Geng Mak Mak menceritakan kisah seorang bakal ibu, Dahlia yang cuba belajar untuk menjadi seorang ibu yang terbaik untuk anaknya daripada 4 orang sahabat yang juga bergelar ibu.

programme.title: Roda Panas - EP 8

programme.title: Beriyani Gam Kak Aspalela - EP 4

programme.title: Mini Me Bakes - EP 1
programme.desc: Rancangan memasak yang menampilkan selebriti Malaysia bersama anak-anak mereka di dapur, dengan citarasa Malaysia diselitkan resipi untuk diikuti oleh semua penonton.

programme.title: Biar Mimpi Sampai Ke Bintang
programme.desc: Kisah percintaan dua remaja yang mempunyai latar belakang keluarga yang berbeza. Randy Pangalila digandingkan dengan Elfira Loy dalam kisah romantis.

programme.title: Roti Cicah Susu - EP 13
programme.desc: Empat orang anak yatim terpisah. Selepas 15 tahun, mereka bertemu semula dan cuba untuk mencari jawapan tentang apa yang berlaku sehingga membuka banyak rahsia yang tak sepatutnya diketahui.

programme.title: Lara Oh Lara! - EP 10

programme.title: Perang Periuk - EP 10

programme.title: Jawaani Jaaneman
programme.desc: A 40 year-old playboy's life turns upside down when he comes to know that he has a 20 something year-old daughter. Release Year: 2020 Director: Nitin Kakkar

programme.title: Koi Mil Gaya
programme.desc: Rohit, a youth with a mental disability, befriends an alien. When the police learn about the alien, they try to capture it while Rohit tries his best to protect his new friend. 2003 Release Year: 2003 Director: Rakesh Roshan

programme.title: No Entry
programme.desc: A married man decides to have an extramarital affair. Things do not go as planned and life becomes a bundle of confusion. Release Year: 2005 Director: Anees Bazmee Awards: 2006 Nominee Filmfare Award Best Film

programme.title: Chandu Champion
programme.desc: A man who faced one adversary after another with an undying spirit. His unwavering zeal and never give up attitude led to India's first individual gold medal in any form of the Olympics. Release Year: 2024 Director: Kabir Khan Awards: 2025 Winner Jury's Choice Award- Best Actor- Kartik Aaryan

programme.title: Super Singh
programme.desc: A man's life changes after he unknowingly gets super powers and then embarks on a journey that helps him discover the true meaning of love and life.

programme.title: Kismat Konnection
programme.desc: Bad karma chases Raj who's told by a gypsy that a lucky charm will change his life, and when Priya enters his life, he realises that it's true! Release Year: 2008 Director: Aziz Mirza

programme.title: Baazigar
programme.desc: VickyShah Rukh Khan and SeemaKajol are to marry but her sister gets killed. What unravels then is a deadly plot of revenge that could ruin Seema and her family! A 1993 thriller! Release Year: 1993 Director: Abbas Alibhai Burmawalla

programme.title: Loafer
programme.desc: A villager who dreams of going to Dubai, finds himself cheated by a middleman and an old friend who promises to help gets killed by his boss. Release Year: 1996 Director: David Dhawan Awards: 1997 Nominee Filmfare AwardBest Comic ActorShakti Kapoor

programme.title: Ek Aur Ek Gyarah
programme.desc: Two thieves betray Major Ram's hospitality and kidnap his son to rescue their mother from two wanted gangsters. Release Year: 2003 Director: David Dhawan

programme.title: Sanam Teri Kasam

Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.desc: To gain a better understanding of some professions, school children explain jobs to their parents in their own words.

A number of celebrities will also come to talk about their experiences, including champion Teddy Riner.

programme.desc: Delpierre and Villeneuve prepare to defend the anti-Lymitrol amendment with a radio interview. Bowman decides to leak the link between the MP's wife and the Paoletti Foundation. Chloe discovers that her father had made one last phone call before dying.

programme.title: Jeux D'influence - EP 6
programme.desc: Chloe is convinced that Percy is involved in her father's death. He then tries to ensure she poses a threat. Saskia's intimidation attempt leads Sorensen to contact Claire. She manages to get him to reveal the name of the laboratory that tested Edenx, thus relaunching her investigation.

programme.title: E-Rallye Monte-Carlo 2025

She refuses to live confined within the walls of the royal palace and runs away with the help of Prince Tut to find her mother, Queen Nefertiti, who has been exiled on Elephantine Island...

programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What you need to know: the Francophone view of the day's main events. Economics, social debates, international news: the expertise of our journalists. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: 64' Debat
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What it's all about: the guests take an in-depth look at a key issue. Increased focus on Francophone cultural news, with dedicated sequences. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: La Grande Galerie Francophone - EP 10
programme.desc: Every week and in public, Ali Baddou and his group of columnists receive French-speaking artists who are at the heart of current events and move the lines. Space for exchanges, creations and surprises, ''La Grande Galerie Francophone'' celebrates art in all its diversity and shares it with everyone.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 11
programme.desc: On YouTube, Abdellah has 85,000 subscribers. His channel is one of the first in France dedicated to recreational fishing: he films himself with humor and pedagogy in his territory, the coasts of Cap Frehel.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Interieurs - EP 6
programme.desc: Anne-Catherine Verwaerde visits a local secondhand shop with a unique atmosphere before pulling up her sleeves with Asma at Atelier 26, a gem of design creators who are honouring metal. She then uncovers the secrets of earthenware in Desvres.

programme.title: Recolter L'hiver
programme.desc: Producing vegetables without heating while it's snowing is the challenge taken up by Jean-Marie Fortier, the market gardeners of Ferme des Quatre-Temps, Jardin des Funambules and Ferme Chapeau Melon. An immersion into the daily life of pioneers who manage to harvest fresh vegetables in the heart of the Quebec winter.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Chef Pays - EP 3
programme.desc: Cooking is a way of building bridges between countries and sharing cultural diversity. Starting with a typical ingredient from the French overseas departments and territories, the chef creates a unique dish.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Interieurs - EP 6
programme.desc: Anne-Catherine Verwaerde visits a local secondhand shop with a unique atmosphere before pulling up her sleeves with Asma at Atelier 26, a gem of design creators who are honouring metal. She then uncovers the secrets of earthenware in Desvres.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 11
programme.desc: On YouTube, Abdellah has 85,000 subscribers. His channel is one of the first in France dedicated to recreational fishing: he films himself with humor and pedagogy in his territory, the coasts of Cap Frehel.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 18
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 21
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 34
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 51
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 15
programme.desc: Still in the parallel world, Pokou and Boni take refuge in a clearing but during the night they hear strange noises. Pokou sets off in search of Boni who seems to have disappeared.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 16
programme.desc: A monstrous creature has imprisoned Boni! Pokou will need all her courage and self-control to free her friend.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Bien Vivre En France - EP 6
programme.desc: In Guadeloupe, Mr Barbin is a maker of Ka drums. The instrument is fundamental to gwoka, a music genre handed down by the Africans deported to the West Indies that has become a veritable expression of local culture.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ? - EP 18
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Ment 4
programme.desc: Verner calls on his colleagues from sensitive affairs to help his partner, Isabelle. She changed her identity to escape a violent husband, Manotti, who enjoys protected witness status. But he has found her and wants to regain custody of their son Tom.

programme.title: Foot! (1/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Foot! (2/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Louloute
programme.desc: Normandy, in the 1980s. Between the cows, Club Dorothee and chunky woollen jumpers, life for 10 year-old Louloute is one of dreams, love and family squabbles. But as the family farm falls further into debt, that life is about the change forever...

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 28
programme.desc: We join Regis Le Bris as he charts his meteoric journey from the training pitches of France to the dugout at Sunderland, where he masterminded an unlikely charge to the Premier League. Le Bris reflects on the philosophy and resilience that helped his side punch far above their weight. We also travel back to France to uncover the formative experiences and influences that shaped one of football's most intriguing modern managers.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 10
programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Sunderland AFC; a club defined by its dramatic highs and painful lows. From their proud top-flight legacy to the heartbreak of consecutive relegations, Sunderland's story is one of resilience, identity, and unbreakable community spirit. Now, under the leadership of new head coach Regis Le Bris, the Black Cats are preparing for a new chapter.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Andrew Van Zyl vs. Champion Dalcha
programme.desc: This episode features main event Andrew 'One Gear' Van Zyl vs. Champion Dalcha for the heavyweight title. From EFC71 in Carnival City, Johannesburg, South Africa on 23-June-2018.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Nate Campbell vs. Ali Funeka
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. programme.title: Greatest Classics Mike Tyson vs. Sammy Scaff
programme.desc: The talk of the boxing world takes center stage as a young Mike Tyson displays the lethal combination of speed and power that would later make him a World Champion. Tyson enters the Felt Forum in New York City with a 13-0 record, having knocked out every opponent he's faced thus far, with 9 of those knockouts coming in the first round.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paul Williams vs. Antonio Margarito
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a WBO welterweight title bout featuring then-undefeated Paul Williams and Antonio Margarito. It's a closely scored bout, but one fighter's push towards a strong finish may have put him ahead just enough.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. Show 5 featuring Mitakeumi, Takakeisho, Goeido and Asanoyama from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Todd Foster
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (47-3-0 21 KO) faces Todd Foster (33-3-0 29 KO) in a 12-round contest for the vacant IBC Welterweight Title from Atlantic City New Jersey USA.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: Andy heads to the coast of Southern Japan in search of a mudskipper that can help him.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures (S1) - EP 22
programme.desc: Andy blasts off in his safari-sub to the coast of South Africa in search of an octopus.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Andy heads to Canada in his safari-mobile and meets a chipmunk collecting acorns.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1) - EP 34
programme.desc: When Andy accidentally breaks a plaster cast of a ring tailed lemur's footprint that Mr Hammond made, it's up to Andy to put things right.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Andy encounters some baby Lar Gibbons in Thailand that appear to be flying as they swing through the rainforest.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 5
programme.desc: Globetrotting Andy, Jen and Scout are on a new mission in their Eco-Explorer: to discover more about incredible animal families and their babies.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Andy journeys 30,000 years into the past and joins a herd of woolly mammoths.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures (S1) - EP 11
programme.desc: Andy leaps into his time-travelling clock to visit a fearsome sabre-toothed cat, but when his gizmo malfunctions he is accidentally shrunk down to the size of an insect.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 53
programme.desc: When Monty sees Violet enjoying doing absolutely nothing, he starts to wonder if it is a good thing to take a break and relax.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S3) - EP 22
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran are enjoying a canal walk when they meet Ned and Monty, who need some help - Ned has lost the lock key, causing a canal traffic jam. It's time for a Gran Gran plan.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S3) - EP 21
programme.desc: JoJo wants to bake banana loaf for Jared, who's coming to dinner, but the bananas are too green. It's time for a Gran Gran plan - what can they make with green bananas?

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 34
programme.desc: After Sarah helps Scarf Lady prepare the wool for her new roof, she settles down for a dreamy sleep.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 33
programme.desc: The Bubble Man is in town so a visit to the Big Shop is in order for Sarah, Duck and Donkey.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S23) - EP 14
programme.desc: While working on the Chinese railway, Thomas misses his friend Percy, and takes a trip down the memory lane.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 37
programme.desc: Dad thinks the kids have too many toys and suggests a chuck out. To save their beloved Mr Monkeyjocks from getting the chop, Bluey and Bingo must prove he is special.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 38
programme.desc: When Uncle Rad and Frisky accidentally turn up to babysit Bluey and Bingo on the same night, they have to work together to make Bluey feel better about babysitter put-downs.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 39
programme.desc: Bingo is playing Bad Mood with Dad, standing on his feet as Dad stomps around the house, controlling everything Bingo does and causing chaos.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 13
programme.desc: Evil Pea creates an evil version of her nemesis, Supertato. With the help of her hench-Cobs, Evil Pea makes a big, green lumbering spud that she names Monstertato!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 50
programme.desc: Roly is digging in the garden when his spade suddenly hits something. It's a key. But what does it do? Duggee has his key badge, they can find out through trial and error.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 51
programme.desc: Duggee's uniform is a bit old and needs to be updated. Duggee can make his own clothes!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: It's fun on the counting train until Naughty Monkey starts to drive! Ethel makes a shape, Frog drops beats with a ribbit song, and Enid turns into anime to chase after a mouse.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 25
programme.desc: When Grandmaster Glitch supersizes a fierce Komodo dragon, the Go Jetters must act fast!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 26
programme.desc: The Go Jetters visit London on New Year's Eve, but Big Ben is missing! To the Vroomster!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 27
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are off to see the Geysers in Iceland, but Grandmaster Glitch and the Grimbots have beaten them to it, and managed to get themselves stuck in the Geysers.

programme.title: My World Kitchen (S3) - EP 15
programme.desc: Tilly is making spiced chocolate biscuits shaped like beautiful snowflakes.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 14
programme.desc: Andy, Jen and Scout head to the Bandhavgarh tiger reserve in India on a baby animal mission to track down a female tiger and her new born cubs. Along the way, our team outwit a sloth that strays dangerously close to the den where the cubs are resting.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S7) - EP 22
programme.desc: A carrier seagull delivery service for shipwrecked pirates, called Wing It Now, has been launched. Captain Captain, Sandy and Seaweed each choose something for delivery.

programme.title: Panda and Krash (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: In the toy shop, Raccoon is enjoying music wearing headphones and dancing.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 23
programme.desc: Playing 'Shops' is the best game ever for Bluey and her friends - if they can ever get started! With Bluey questioning the rules and changing who's who, they might be here all day!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 24
programme.desc: Bluey can't wait to get to the monkey bars as Dad takes her and Bingo on a wagon ride to the park. But her patience is tested when Dad keeps stopping to chat with other grown-ups.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 25

programme.title: Late Night with Seth Meyers - EP 1740
programme.desc: Emmy Award-nominated "Late Night with Seth Meyers," hosted by award-winning writer and performer Seth Meyers, is home to incisive humor, topical jokes and A-list celebrity guests. The series’ signature "A Closer Look" segment has garnered millions of views and is widely lauded for its tightly written and thoughtful approach to analyzing and satirizing news of the day.

programme.title: Late Night with Seth Meyers - EP 1741
programme.desc: Emmy Award-nominated "Late Night with Seth Meyers," hosted by award-winning writer and performer Seth Meyers, is home to incisive humor, topical jokes and A-list celebrity guests. The series’ signature "A Closer Look" segment has garnered millions of views and is widely lauded for its tightly written and thoughtful approach to analyzing and satirizing news of the day.

programme.title: Executive Decisions - EP 7
programme.desc: ‘Executive Decisions’ is a CNBC podcast offering a rare window into the minds of top decision-makers. Hosted by Steve Sedgwick, each episode explores the pivotal choices that shape the careers and legacies of business leaders and policymakers. Through candid conversations about risk, doubt and conviction, the series reminds us that even the most powerful face uncertainty and trade-offs.

programme.title: CNBC Sport: On The Record
programme.desc: CNBC Sport: On The Record explores the convergence of sports, business, and investing. Each week, we sit down with the biggest names in sports - from league commissioners, team owners, influential media executives and top athletes - to give you an insider's perspective on the strategies, deals, and stories shaping sports and business.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon
programme.desc: Emmy Award- and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings a high-tempo energy to the storied NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon
programme.desc: Emmy Award- and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings a high-tempo energy to the storied NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: "American Greed" goes inside the dark side of the American Dream - where money seduces, power corrupts, and smooth criminals will stop at nothing to get rich.

programme.title: CNBC Meets
programme.desc: CNBC’s Tania Bryer gets 'up close and personal' with some of the world's most famous faces from the world of business, politics, sport, and the arts. They all have two things in common; they are all internationally renowned and they are all major philanthropists.

programme.title: Managing Asia
programme.desc: CNBC’s longest running feature show. For over 20 years Christine Tan has been talking to people who are shaping, governing and leading the Asia-Pacific region in this multi-award award winning show.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and "accepted wisdom" to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, the Agenda quite simply sets the agenda. You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Talk Africa
programme.desc: Talk Africa is a weekly discussion show that brings the most influential voices in Africa to the world. Broadcast from CGTN’s production center in the Kenyan capital, Nairobi, Talk Africa looks at Africa and the world from an African perspective.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues. We examine the changes and growth in China's domestic leagues, as the country undergoes an incredible economic transformation.

programme.title: Biz Talk
programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. Season 2 follows Sachi (Koshiba Fuka), who, after overcoming hardships and marrying the 6th heir Tomozo (Matsumoto Leo), faces new trials. As Isuzuya grows, she endures loss, defies convention to become its seventh female head, and boldly opens an Edo branch. With inventive ideas and strong bonds, she builds its foundation- a vibrant tale steeped in Japan’s kimono culture, a heritage now captivating the world.

programme.desc: A Japanese festival favourite, yakisoba are noodles cooked in a special sauce - enjoy local yakisoba from all over Japan!

programme.title: Is That Picture Real?
programme.desc: A billion cats are on the loose!? An online post throws a father into a panic - how should we interact with online information when fake images are on the rise especially during disasters?

programme.title: Ukiyo-e Edo-Life
programme.desc: Off to Go Bathing: A mother and daughter brave the rain to visit their local bathhouse - in the process, we learn that regular bathing was an essential part of life for townspeople.

programme.title: Newsroom Tokyo
programme.desc: This programme gives you comprehensive coverage of events in Japan and Asia, explaining the day's developments and what is behind them.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture - this episode looks at words related to sleep. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #6 Does this train go to Ikebukuro? / Find out how to ask if public transportation goes to your destination; use the name of the place plus 'ni ikimasu ka'.

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: A Sri Lankan student participates in the Mie Prefecture "Youth Police Supporters" volunteer programme that works with communities to build a safer society by preventing crimes before they occur.

programme.title: Hello! NHK World-Japan

programme.desc: Two distinguished criminal barristers, Fan Siu Yu and Yiu Lik Hung, have been rivals since law school. Despite being classmates, their personalities and approaches to law are very different, leading to years of personal and professional conflict.

programme.title: Royal Tramp
programme.desc: The story tells of Wei Xiaobao's journey to serve in the Qing court, where he is assigned by Eunuch Hai to spy on the Empress Dowager's activities. Xiaobao uses his wit to eventually force the fake Empress Dowager to leave and bring the treacherous Ao Bai to justice.

programme.title: Good Job - EP 3

programme.title: Destined - EP 36
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru (Song Yi), the daughter of a cloth merchant who’s suffered childhood hardships, is married off to Gu Jiu Si (Bai Jing Ting), the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.

programme.title: In Bed With A Stranger - EP 4
programme.desc: Someone assaults Ching-tin. Fortunately, Man-sum turns up and intervenes just in time. Actually, that person is Lai Chau, the father of a gifted child called Lai Ka-ming, who was interviewed many years ago. Lai Chau alleges a news story written by Ching-tin caused his family to break up. Ching-tin feels she has wronged Lai Chau as she reviews the old story, so she wants to make it up to him by helping him locate missing Ka-ming.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 774
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: The Limbo - EP 12
programme.desc: As the New Year approaches, an unexpected subsidence accident occurs at the old department store, Luobai Mall, in Haizhou City, trapping 13 people underground. This race against time and for survival becomes a profound test of humanity, morality, and faith...

programme.title: Love Song in Winter - EP 1
programme.desc: Detective Jiang Chengyi (Huang Jingyu) and anesthesiologist Lu Yan (Sun Qian) unexpectedly reunite eight years after their breakup. Together, they solve a serial murder case, clear up misunderstandings, and rekindle their relationship.

programme.title: No Room for Crime - EP 7
programme.desc: Kwok-wai cannot find Tung-tung. He astonishingly takes risks by starting live streaming on a computer. He points out he changes the ransom money into a reward for persons informing on the kidnapper. Wing-kei does not like Kwok-wai’s method. However, his idea works as a store owner provides information. Tsung wants to silence some kid as they see his face. The kidnapping is concluded. Kwok-wai receives some message from the school as his big son Yiu-bong is suspected of joining a gang.

programme.title: Shadow Love - EP 1
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The story follows Li Shuang (played by Song Yi), the adopted daughter of a great general guarding the borders of the Great Jin, and Jin An (played by Cheng Lei), the heir of Western Rong. programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2103
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: In Bed With A Stranger - EP 5
programme.desc: Ching-tin finds the two torn diary pages. And Man-sum happens to come home. Ching-tin reviews the two pages and realizes she has wrongly blamed Man-sum. Ching-tin is remorseful and leaves. However, she is abruptly abducted. Man-sum locates Ching-tin just in time. And he gets hurt as he saves her.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 775
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Class of Distinction - EP 14
programme.desc: Hong Kong superstar Leon Lai joins forces with many friends in the entertainment industry to star in the TVB drama "Good Morning Sir," playing a passionate and energetic young teacher who experiences unique challenges in school, family, and relationships.

programme.title: Knot To Treasure - EP 7
programme.desc: Wei (Zhu Jiang), the eldest son of Wei (Chen Jiewen), is wild and untamed. Under family pressure, he finally marries Shan (Zhang Fengni), with whom he has been dating for many years. After their marriage, Yat-sen develops an extramarital affair with Yan (Cui Jiabao), eventually living with her and abandoning Shan. Later, realizing Yan's overly open attitude towards relationships, he decides to pursue Shan again.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 23
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 24

programme.title: Defected, The - EP 13
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects.

The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 26
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Defected, The - EP 15
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects.

programme.title: Defected, The - EP 16
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects.

programme.title: Class of Distinction - EP 16
programme.desc: Hong Kong superstar Leon Lai joins forces with many friends in the entertainment industry to star in the TVB drama "Good Morning Sir," playing a passionate and energetic young teacher who experiences unique challenges in school, family, and relationships.

programme.title: Knot To Treasure - EP 8
programme.desc: Wei (Zhu Jiang), the eldest son of Wei (Chen Jiewen), is wild and untamed. Under family pressure, he finally marries Shan (Zhang Fengni), with whom he has been dating for many years. After their marriage, Yat-sen develops an extramarital affair with Yan (Cui Jiabao), eventually living with her and abandoning Shan. Later, realizing Yan's overly open attitude towards relationships, he decides to pursue Shan again.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 25
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. programme.title: Defected, The - EP 16
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 21
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a ‘Fire master’ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING’s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 10
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

programme.title: I've Got The Power - EP 6
programme.desc: Chung Hau-nin (Ruco Chan), Kiu Yeuk-lam (Natalie Tong) and Ko Yung (Joel Chan) are complete strangers. After surviving a traffic accident, they astonishingly gain mystical power!_x000D__x000D_Hau-nin and Ding Shuk-man (Moon Lau) are a loving young married couple. Hau-nin intends to use his mystical power for his own benefit, but he knows how to use his mystical power to help other people as he is influenced by Yeuk-lam, who has a righteous character.

programme.title: Battle Against Evil, The - EP 7
programme.desc: General LI (TONG, MICHAEL) of the Chor Kingdom and wizard CHAI (CHAN HO, MOSES) were colleagues under the same mentor. LI killed CHAR when he found out that CHAR was having an affair with his wife SUKI (LEUNG TSAND, JADE). SUKI was ashamed of her affair, so she committed suicide. After she died, CHAI was furious and killed LI. He used bad magic to turn LI’s spirit into a cloud of hatred in order to prevent him from reincarnation.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 20
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 21
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: Mahjong Heroes
programme.desc: A hero helps a young student deflect a cunning and malicious gambling tycoon who is out to take over the student's family business over a game of mahjong.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well (Extended Version)
programme.desc: In this beloved Hong Kong comedy, the three Chang brothers living with their parents learn that love blossoms with nurture, but withers when taken for granted through haste, deceit, and selfishness. This extended version features an additional shootout scene that was omitted from the original theatrical release during Lunar New Year 2016.

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddy's career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation...

programme.title: Royal Tramp II
programme.desc: The leader of Dragon clan, Long Er, helps General Wu to overthrow Emperor Kang Xi. However, Long Er is betrayed by General Wu and is rescued by Xiao Bao. As a result, she bestows her virginity and martial arts power to Xiao Bao to fight against Wu. At the same time, Xiao Bao fortuitously unveils the hidden treasures from "The Sutra of 42 Chapters".

programme.title: Casino Tycoon II
programme.desc: This is a sequel to "Casino Tycoon". 20 years after Benny Ho established his casino empire in Macau, his former partner becomes envious and plots to bring him down. At the same time, a young man working for Benny is the son of his ex-lover, and is also out to take revenge on him. Ho however, is not about to take things lying down...

programme.title: Everlasting Regret
programme.desc: Adapted from an award-winning Chinese novel, the story follows the life of a legendary Shanghai beauty Wang Qi Yao from her glamorous to her simpler days. She stays true to her own way of life while surviving the constant betrayal of her men, and bears witness to the waves of change to her city from 1947 to 1981.

programme.title: My School Mate, The Barbarian
programme.desc: Edward attends a new school which has a reputation for fighting. Student leader Stone, befriends Edward, but their friendship is tested when a local triad leader discovers that Edward comes from a wealthy family.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Mun undergoes a cornea transplant to correct her blindness, but ends up gaining more than the gift of sight. She shockingly realises that she is seeing another woman instead of herself whenever she looks into a mirror. Recalling that things changed ever since her cornea was replaced, Mun vows to uncover the truth behind her strange vision...

programme.title: The Truth: Final Episode
programme.desc: Raymond's lawyer licence is suspended as he has prevented the course of justice to clear his mother's conviction. He is subsequently framed for murder with every piece of evidence pointing towards him. The only one with proof of his innocence is his dying mother, who fights to stay alive long enough to exonerate her son before it is too late.

programme.title: My Darling Genie
programme.desc: A genie who is trapped in a Chinese oil umbrella helps an honorable young man and his uncle to deal with a covetous loan shark.

programme.title: Shark Busters
programme.desc: During the financial crisis, a vast majority of Hong Kong people experience difficulties in repaying debts. During this time, loan sharks use ruthless ways to force debtors to repay their loans and it is up to Officer Lee and his underground team to hunt down the head of this illegal organization.

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis. His marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him. Meanwhile, his wife is off to care for her dying ex-lover who shares a complicated history with the couple...

programme.title: The Exodus
programme.desc: A low-ranking cop discovers a group of women, including his superior, Madam Fang and his wife, plotting to eliminate the world of men.

programme.title: Mr Vampire II
programme.desc: Grave-robbing archaeologists unearth a family of preserved vampires and plan to sell them on the black market. However, they accidentally break the paper spells that had kept the vampires immobilized during transport. The vampires escape, but a local herbalist Lin is soon on their trail, determined to destroy them.

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair II
programme.desc: After being betrayed by Zhuo, the white-haired witch Lian seeks revenge by slaughtering her way through the eight martial arts clans. However, she is soon attacked by a man whose bride she has abducted. Meanwhile, Zhuo, who is waiting on a hilltop for a flower to bloom for Lian's restoration, hastens to save her upon realizing the danger she is in.

programme.title: Hong Kong Hong Kong
programme.desc: After moving to Hong Kong, illegal immigrant Mang has no choice but to live in cramped quarters with male migrants who abuse her. In order to attain Hong Kong residency and a better life, she agrees to marry a lonely old carpenter. After her marriage, Mang crosses paths again with her ex-lover, and the two develop a passionate affair...

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan reaches out to psychiatrist Dr Jim to restore her sanity and overcome her troubled past. Yet, as Yan gradually heals, Jim finds himself haunted by the same disturbing images, as his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh II
programme.desc: Bodyguard Ah Sun is sent to protect his boss' son, only to meet and fall in love with his mistress, the gorgeous Joey. As love blossoms between the two, the powerful boss finds out and all hell breaks loose!

programme.title: Tristar
programme.desc: Young priest Hong disguises himself to protect Bai, a prostitute, while Detective Liu investigates her ties to a prostitution ring. Hong finds Bai a lawful job and helps her negotiate with the underworld. Meanwhile, Liu's investigation causes misunderstandings - can he crack down on the gang? How will Hong manage his emotions as Bai falls for him?

programme.title: Doubles Cause Troubles
programme.desc: Two squabbling cousins find themselves in more trouble than they can imagine after their tenant ends up dead. The gangsters and the police are both after them, and they have no idea what they have done wrong!

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: How to Pick Girls Up !
programme.desc: Xin, a helpless loser in love, calls in to a radio show hosted by DJ Tsang to ask desperately for help. A self-proclaimed love expert, Tsang takes it upon himself to make sure Xin meets girls and leads him on a series of absurd excursions into the wild and dangerous world of modern love.

programme.title: Cop Shop Babes
programme.desc: Island East Police Station headed by Madam Lui is known for its "Cop Shop Babes" as all the officers there are female. Two police officers, Beer and Satay, apply for an internal transfer to this station in order to approach the girls. It is at this time that the police receives a bomb threat - can they resolve the case?

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: A Chinese Tall Story
programme.desc: While finding ways to rescue his disciples, Monk Tripitaka meets the lizard imp Mei Yan, the ugliest woman alive. Despite the conflict between good and evil, he falls for Mei Yan who sacrifices herself to save him many times. The Monk breaks his "no killing" rule to save his disciples, and things get more complicated as Princess Galaxy appears...

programme.title: Cherie
programme.desc: Cherie Chung plays the title character in this sexy romance as a fitness instructor who attracts the attentions of a wealthy businessman and a handsome photographer.

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh
programme.desc: When a young housewife's debt-ridden, philandering husband leaves her with a mountain of tax debts, a security guard is hired by the tax authority to guard the assets, but he starts falling for her instead.

programme.title: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: An old lady died after mysteriously falling off a building and her ghost appears to haunt the place. This freaked out the security guards, who invite ghostbuster Leo and his female assistant to help. In the process, Leo finds out that the old lady was killed by her son and daughter in law. To rest her soul, Leo promises to bring the couple to justice.

programme.title: Perfect Girls
programme.desc: Chi will inherit his dying grandfather's fortune with one condition - he has to be married in a month, otherwise the money goes to his uncle, Robert. Chi falls in love with Siu Siu, but Robert intends to stop them by sending Moraine to seduce Chi. When Moraine decides to marry Chi for money, Robert stops her and reveals their plot.

programme.title: The Truth
programme.desc: Orphaned lawyer Raymond Lau once helped clear hooker Lan of murder charges, not knowing that Lan is his mother. When a corrupt cop blackmails Lan with Raymond's identity, she kills him out of desperation. When Raymond is enlisted again to defend Lan, he uncovers the secret that she has been hiding about their relationship for years.

programme.title: Golden Swallow
programme.desc: A heroine finds herself in a love triangle with a swordsman and a warrior. They team up to conquer the evil forces of the martial arts world but she is unable to choose between both men even as they face a deadly duel.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fete. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servant's confusion, threatening the couple's union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: The Champion
programme.desc: After years in prison, Lu Hu returns home to find himself set up by his ruthless brother Piao, who has taken over the family coal mine business and imprisoned their sister. Hu takes down Piao and saves his sister but their coal mine falls into the hands of a Japanese gang, which Hu and his sister must fight in order to get it back.

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: The Sword Master passes on his sword to his disciple Lin before he dies. However, Lin soon discovers that another disciple Fang also eyes the sword and plots to take it away from Lin, destroying his family and blinding him in the process. Finally, Lin battles Fang for revenge and vows to reclaim his sword.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: Swordsman and Enchantress
programme.desc: The story happens in a martial arts world where everyone tries to obtain the "Deer Sword". Lian's wife is wounded in an ambush and his rival Xiao saves her. They escape to Xiao's home and he treats her poisonous wound. This leads Lian to suspect his wife's faithfulness and results in several blood-splattering duels with Xiao.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: King Gambler
programme.desc: This film was actually a lively forerunner to the gambling film craze, which eventually swept Asian cinema. Here, it's cardsharp versus cardsharp with a lot more kung-fu action, in a battle of wits and fists to become the king of the casino. The double stings and triple crosses raise in complexity and imagination until what started as an unusual box office risk became a top ten hit of 1976.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: The Kingdom and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the Emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. When he sends for Li one year later, she was too ill to withstand the arduous journey and arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed "The Invincible Fist" is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: Intimate Confessions of a Chinese Courtesan
programme.desc: Young Ai Nu is abducted and sold to the popular Four Seasons brothel run by the powerful and ruthless Madam Chun Yi. Ai Nu gets locked up in a dungeon due to her fiery attitude. Soon, a murder occurs within the brothel and a policeman must race against time to prevent a vicious revenge plot from reaching its blood-spattered conclusion.

programme.title: Martial Arts of Shaolin
programme.desc: Zhi Ming, who trains at the Northern Shaolin Temple, teams up with Si Ma Yan, who trains at the Southern Shaolin Temple, to avenge both their fathers' death by assassinating a corrupt magistrate, leading to a series of fierce battles!

programme.title: That Fiery Girl
programme.desc: The bandits of Hulu Valley slay the chief of the Mei Clan while searching for a treasure map. In retaliation, Chun from the Mei Clan infiltrates the bandit's fortress to map a way in for the authorities, but ends up falling in love with the bandit leader's daughter, Pearl. While Chun's plot is uncovered, he receives unexpected help from Pearl.

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Qi Ming Xing, an assassin of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to quit the clan. When hunted by the clan, he is saved by Swordsman Zhuo Yi Fan. Zhuo accidentally discovers that Qi is the killer of his wife, but forgives him after knowing Qi's guilt over her death. The two finally team up to destroy the evil clan.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: Adapted from the classic Chinese novel of the same title, the story follows Monk Tang San Zang's journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: Shaolin Intruders
programme.desc: On a routine courier mission, the prestigious Chief was murdered by four mysterious monks. When all evidence pointed to Ching Hua, his friend Lei decides to clear his name by barging in the Shaolin Temple thrice. When Lei thought justice was served for the culprits, he soon realizes the table had turned and the monks stroke again. What follows is a series of intense pursuit for the ultimate villain!

programme.title: Lover's Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a man's role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Angel with the Iron Fists
programme.desc: Lo Wei directs and stars as the chief detective in this gripping thriller; playing alongside Lily Ho, who excels in the role of an undercover avenger that can fight as well as she flirts! Caught between the crime bosses known as Baldhead and Black Widow, she only has four choices: punch, kick, shoot or bombard with explosives!

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: Lady With A Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman Feng tries to find a group of villains responsible for her eldest sister's death, but is shocked to discover that her fiance, Jin, is one of them. At the same time, Jin's mother and the two other killers are planning to kill Feng. Can Feng fight back and take her revenge?

programme.title: Dawn will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent's consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her...

programme.title: Clan Feuds
programme.desc: Like legendary director Chu Yuan did so often and so successfully, Chang Peng Yi adapted this film from a story by Ku Lung. Following the footsteps of the equally legendary Chang Cheh, Chang also casted the majestic Ti Lung, along with "Venoms" Lo Meng and Sun Chien, for a spectacular showcase of mystical Martial Arts World's intrigue and consummate Kung Fu.

programme.title: Hex
